page.title: 09WEARDALE SHOPPING SURVEY 2
page.content:
The puplis asked their parents, "Where do you shop for these items ?"
------shoes, chemist items, clothes, carpets, furniture, new car, kettle, paint, TV/radio, hammer, watch. { {Results {Westgate/ St. John's Chapel 24 {Stanhope 30 {Crook 17 {Bishop Auckland 148 {Another Place 125
We found that most people can buy their everyday needs at local shops but choose to go outside Weardale for bigger items. Bishop Auckland is a popular shopping centre even though it is 24 miles from Westgate. Newcastle, Durham, Darlington and Hexham are also popular for large items.
